original_title: Lizard People: The Truth About Reptilians
overview: They established rule over ancient man, a race of giants known as The Nephilim. Today, their descendants live among us.  - Plot synopsis: They established rule over ancient man, a race of giants known as The Nephilim. Today, their descendants live among us, veiled in any form they choose... Demon... Alien...even REPTILIAN! Two hard core researchers, Carl Crew and Bryan Sadler, delve deep into the mythology that shrouds the theory of the Reptilians to uncover their true nature and their global power that some say continues to control the world. Through their deceit and deception, will the Reptilians ultimately destroy humankind?
title: Lizard People: The Truth About Reptilians
